subject: Basketball
Amateur Athletics
lead_paragraph: N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern and Adam Silver, the deputy commissioner, toured IMG Academies in Florida for ideas on how to create a European-style basketball academy for young, elite American players.
snippet: N.B.A. Commissioner David Stern and Adam Silver, the deputy commissioner, toured IMG Academies in Florida for ideas on how to create a European-style basketball academy for young, elite American players.
